story_desc: A rag doll that awakens in a postapocalyptic future holds the key to humanity's salvation.

name: A Bug's Life
story_desc: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

name: A Christmas Carol
story_desc: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

name: A Goofy Movie
story_desc: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

name: A Scanner Darkly
story_desc: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

name: Abominable
story_desc: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want him for their own needs.

name: Akira
story_desc: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

name: Aladdin
story_desc: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

name: Alice in Wonderland
story_desc: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

name: All Dogs Go to Heaven
story_desc: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
story_desc: Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
story_desc: The world-famous singing preteen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

name: An American Tail
story_desc: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

name: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
story_desc: Fievel's family decides to move out to the West, unaware that they are falling into a trap perpetrated by a smooth-talking cat.

name: Anastasia
story_desc: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

name: The Angry Birds Movie
story_desc: When an island populated by happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious green piggies, it's up to three unlikely outcasts - Red, Chuck and Bomb - to figure out what the pigs are up to.

name: Anomalisa
story_desc: A man crippled by the mundanity of his life experiences something out of the ordinary.

name: Antz
story_desc: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

name: Arthur Christmas
story_desc: Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than two hours.

name: Arthur and the Invisibles
story_desc: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, tiny people living in harmony with nature.

name: Astro Boy
story_desc: When an android replica of a boy is rejected by his aggrieved creator, he goes off to find his own identity in an adventure that would make him the greatest hero of his time.

name: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
story_desc: A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

name: Resident Evil: Degeneration
story_desc: Leon S. Kennedy and Claire Redfield must battle a rogue warrior seeking revenge after unleashing the deadly G-Virus, whilst a mutated monster goes on a rampage.

name: Balto
story_desc: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

name: Bambi
story_desc: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.

name: Barnyard
story_desc: When the farmer's away, all the animals play, and sing, and dance. Eventually, though, someone has to step in and run things, a responsibility that ends up going to Otis, a carefree cow.

name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
story_desc: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

name: Batman: The Killing Joke
story_desc: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

name: Beauty and the Beast
story_desc: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

name: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
story_desc: Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.

name: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
story_desc: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

name: Bee Movie
story_desc: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

name: Beowulf
story_desc: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel, who is terrorizing Denmark, then Grendel's Mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

name: Big Hero 6
story_desc: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

name: Bolt
story_desc: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

name: Brave
story_desc: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

name: Brother Bear
story_desc: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

name: 5 Centimeters per Second
story_desc: Told in three interconnected segments, we follow a young man named Takaki through his life as cruel winters, cold technology, and finally, adult obligations and responsibility converge to test the delicate petals of love.

name: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
story_desc: Two overly imaginative pranksters named George and Harold hypnotize their principal into thinking he's a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

name: Cars
story_desc: On the way to the biggest race of his life, a hotshot rookie race car gets stranded in a rundown town, and learns that winning isn't everything in life.

name: Cars 2
story_desc: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

name: Cars 3
story_desc: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

name: Chicken Little
story_desc: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

name: Chicken Run
story_desc: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

name: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
story_desc: Thirty years after their popular television show ended, chipmunks Chip and Dale live very different lives. When a cast member from the original series mysteriously disappears, the pair must reunite to save their friend.

name: Cinderella
story_desc: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.

name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
story_desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
story_desc: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

name: Coco
story_desc: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

name: Coraline
story_desc: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

name: Corpse Bride
story_desc: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

name: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
story_desc: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up to the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

name: DC League of Super-Pets
story_desc: Krypto the Super-Dog and Superman are inseparable best friends, sharing the same superpowers and fighting crime side by side in Metropolis. However, Krypto must master his own powers for a rescue mission when Superman is kidnapped.

name: Despicable Me
story_desc: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

name: Despicable Me 2
story_desc: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

name: Despicable Me 3
story_desc: Gru meets his long-lost, charming, cheerful, and more successful twin brother Dru, who wants to team up with him for one last criminal heist.

name: Dinosaur
story_desc: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sanctuary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

name: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
story_desc: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods
story_desc: The Z-Fighters must contend with Lord Beerus, the God of Destruction, but only a God can fight a God, and none of them are Gods. However with the creation of the Super Saiyan God, will the Z-Fighters be able to defeat Lord Beerus?

name: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
story_desc: Scrooge McDuck takes Huey, Dewey, and Louie to Egypt to find a pyramid and magic lamp.

name: Dumbo
story_desc: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

name: Encanto
story_desc: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

name: Enchanted
story_desc: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil Queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

name: Epic
story_desc: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and evil is taking place. She bands together with a ragtag group of characters to save their world--and ours.

name: Escape from Planet Earth
story_desc: Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet.

name: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
story_desc: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.

name: Fantasia
story_desc: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music, ranging from the abstract to depictions of mythology and fantasy, and settings including the prehistoric, supernatural and sacred.

name: Fantasia 2000
story_desc: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
story_desc: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

name: Ferdinand
story_desc: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.

name: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
story_desc: The magical inhabitants of a rainforest fight to save their home, which is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.

name: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
story_desc: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

name: Finding Dory
story_desc: Friendly but forgetful blue tang Dory begins a search for her long-lost parents and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

name: Finding Nemo
story_desc: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

name: Flushed Away
story_desc: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

name: Frankenweenie
story_desc: When a boy's beloved dog passes away suddenly, he attempts to bring the animal back to life through a powerful science experiment.

name: Frozen
story_desc: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

name: Frozen II
story_desc: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.

name: G-Force
story_desc: A specially trained squad of guinea pigs is dispatched to stop a diabolical billionaire from taking over the world.

name: Ponyo
story_desc: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

name: Garfield
story_desc: Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.

name: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
story_desc: Jon and Garfield visit the United Kingdom, where a case of mistaken cat identity finds Garfield ruling over a castle. His reign is soon jeopardized by the nefarious Lord Dargis, who has designs on the estate.

name: Tales from Earthsea
story_desc: In a mythical land, a man and a young boy investigate a series of unusual occurrences.

name: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
story_desc: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

name: Gnomeo & Juliet
story_desc: Separated by a garden fence and a feud, are blue gnomes on one side and red gnomes on the other. This doesn't stop blue Gnomeo and red Juliet from falling in love with each other. Do they have a future together?

name: Happy Feet
story_desc: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

name: Happy Feet Two
story_desc: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

name: Howl's Moving Castle
story_desc: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

name: Heavy Metal
story_desc: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

name: Pom Poko
story_desc: A community of magical shape-shifting raccoon dogs struggle to prevent their forest home from being destroyed by urban development.

name: Hercules
story_desc: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

name: Home
story_desc: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.

name: Hoodwinked
story_desc: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman, and Granny all tell the police the events that led up to their encounter.

name: Hop
story_desc: E.B., the Easter Bunny's teenage son, heads to Hollywood, determined to become a drummer in a rock 'n' roll band. In LA, he's taken in by Fred after the out-of-work slacker hits E.B. with his car.

name: Horton Hears a Who!
story_desc: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

name: Grave of the Fireflies
story_desc: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

name: Hotel Transylvania
story_desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

name: Hotel Transylvania 2
story_desc: Dracula and his friends try to bring out the monster in his half human, half vampire grandson in order to keep Mavis from leaving the hotel.

name: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
story_desc: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family.

name: Hotel Transylvania 4: Transformania
story_desc: After one experiment, Johnny turns into a monster and everyone else becomes human. Now it has to be seen whether they will be able to reverse this experiment.

name: How to Train Your Dragon
story_desc: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
story_desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
story_desc: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek "The Hidden World", a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

name: Ice Age
story_desc: The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

name: Ice Age: Collision Course
story_desc: When Scrat's acorn sends an asteroid to Earth, the Herd must find a way to stop the asteroid from hitting Earth with the help of a returning friend.

name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
story_desc: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
story_desc: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

name: Ice Age: The Meltdown
story_desc: Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths.

name: Incredibles 2
story_desc: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

name: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
story_desc: In the year 2032, Batô, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

name: Inside Out
story_desc: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

name: Isle of Dogs
story_desc: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

name: I Lost My Body
story_desc: A story of Naoufel, a young man who is in love with Gabrielle. In another part of town, a severed hand escapes from a dissection lab, determined to find its body again.

name: James and the Giant Peach
story_desc: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

name: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
story_desc: An eight-year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.

name: Ninja Scroll
story_desc: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a beautiful ninja girl and a crafty spy in confronting a demonic clan of killers - with a ghost from his past as their leader - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

name: The Tale of The Princess Kaguya
story_desc: Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthralls all who encounter her, but ultimately she must confront her fate, the punishment for her crime.

name: The Secret World of Arrietty
story_desc: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.

name: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
story_desc: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

name: The Wind Rises
story_desc: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

name: Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train
story_desc: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

name: Your Name.
story_desc: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

name: Klaus
story_desc: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

name: A Silent Voice: The Movie
story_desc: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

name: From Up on Poppy Hill
story_desc: A group of Yokohama teens look to save their school's clubhouse from the wrecking ball in preparations for the 1964 Tokyo Olympics.

name: The Garden of Words
story_desc: A 15-year-old boy and 27-year-old woman find an unlikely friendship one rainy day in the Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden.

name: Kubo and the Two Strings
story_desc: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

name: Kung Fu Panda
story_desc: To everyone's surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.

name: Kung Fu Panda 2
story_desc: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

name: Kung Fu Panda 3
story_desc: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to home.

name: Porco Rosso
story_desc: In 1930s Italy, a veteran World War I pilot is cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

name: Ghost in the Shell
story_desc: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

name: The Illusionist
story_desc: A French illusionist finds himself out of work and travels to Scotland, where he meets a young woman. Their ensuing adventure changes both their lives forever.

name: Fantastic Planet
story_desc: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

name: The Red Turtle
story_desc: A man is shipwrecked on a deserted island and encounters a red turtle, which changes his life.

name: Lady and the Tramp
story_desc: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

name: The Little Prince
story_desc: A little girl lives in a very grown-up world with her mother, who tries to prepare her for it. Her neighbor, the Aviator, introduces the girl to an extraordinary world where anything is possible, the world of the Little Prince.

name: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
story_desc: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

name: The Triplets of Belleville
story_desc: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

name: Lightyear
story_desc: While spending years attempting to return home, marooned Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear encounters an army of ruthless robots commanded by Zurg who are attempting to steal his fuel source.

name: Lilo & Stitch
story_desc: A young and parentless girl adopts a 'dog' from the local pound, completely unaware that it's supposedly a dangerous scientific experiment that's taken refuge on Earth and is now hiding from its creator and those who see it as a menace.

name: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
story_desc: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

name: Loving Vincent
story_desc: In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.

name: Luca
story_desc: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.

name: My Life as a Zucchini
story_desc: After losing his mother, a young boy is sent to an orphanage with other orphans his age where he begins to learn the meaning of trust and true love.

name: Madagascar
story_desc: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

name: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
story_desc: The Madagascar animals join a struggling European circus to get back to New York, but find themselves being pursued by a psychotic animal-control officer.

name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
story_desc: The Madagascar animals fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African nature reserve, where they meet others of their own kind, and Alex especially discovers his royal heritage as prince of a lion pride.

name: Kiki's Delivery Service
story_desc: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

name: Mary and Max
story_desc: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

name: Meet the Robinsons
story_desc: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

name: Megamind
story_desc: Evil genius Megamind finally defeats his do-gooder nemesis, Metro Man, but is left without a purpose in a superhero-free world.

name: Whisper of the Heart
story_desc: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

name: Minions
story_desc: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

name: Minions: The Rise of Gru
story_desc: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.

name: Missing Link
story_desc: Mr. Link recruits explorer Sir Lionel Frost to help find his long-lost relatives in the fabled valley of Shangri-La. Along with adventurer Adelina Fortnight, this trio of explorers travel the world to help their new friend.

name: Moana
story_desc: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

name: Princess Mononoke
story_desc: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

name: Monster House
story_desc: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

name: Monsters University
story_desc: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

name: Monsters vs. Aliens
story_desc: A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.

name: Monsters, Inc.
story_desc: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

name: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
story_desc: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.

name: Mulan
story_desc: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

name: The Cat Returns
story_desc: After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

name: Oliver & Company
story_desc: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York City.

name: Only Yesterday
story_desc: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

name: When Marnie Was There
story_desc: Due to 12 y.o. Anna's asthma, she's sent to stay with relatives of her guardian in the Japanese countryside. She likes to be alone, sketching. She befriends Marnie. Who is the mysterious, blonde Marnie.

name: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
story_desc: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella De Vil, the owners must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

name: Onward
story_desc: Two elven brothers embark on a quest to bring their father back for one day.

name: Open Season
story_desc: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

name: Osmosis Jones
story_desc: A policeman white blood cell, with the help of a cold pill, must stop a deadly virus from destroying the human they live in, Frank.

name: Over the Hedge
story_desc: A scheming raccoon fools a mismatched family of forest creatures into helping him repay a debt of food, by invading the new suburban sprawl that popped up while they were hibernating...and learns a lesson about family himself.

name: Paprika
story_desc: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

name: ParaNorman
story_desc: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

name: Penguins of Madagascar
story_desc: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.

name: Persepolis
story_desc: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

name: Pete's Dragon
story_desc: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.

name: Peter Pan
story_desc: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

name: Pinocchio
story_desc: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

name: Planes
story_desc: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

name: Planet 51
story_desc: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

name: Pocahontas
story_desc: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

name: Puss in Boots
story_desc: An outlaw cat, his childhood egg-friend, and a seductive thief kitty set out in search for the eggs of the fabled Golden Goose to clear his name, restore his lost honor, and regain the trust of his mother and town.

name: Perfect Blue
story_desc: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

name: Ralph Breaks the Internet
story_desc: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.

name: Rango
story_desc: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

name: Ratatouille
story_desc: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

name: Raya and the Last Dragon
story_desc: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

name: Rio
story_desc: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

name: Rio 2
story_desc: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel, and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel and meets his father-in-law.

name: Rise of the Guardians
story_desc: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

name: Robin Hood
story_desc: The story of the legendary British outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.

name: Robots
story_desc: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

name: Ron's Gone Wrong
story_desc: The story of Barney, an awkward middle-schooler and Ron, his new walking, talking, digitally-connected device. Ron's malfunctions set against the backdrop of the social media age launch them on a journey to learn about true friendship.

name: Lupin III: The Castle of Cagliostro
story_desc: A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid cop struggle to free a princess from an evil count, and learn the secret of a treasure that she holds part of the key to.

name: Summer Wars
story_desc: A student tries to fix a problem he accidentally caused in OZ, a digital world, while pretending to be the fiancé of his friend at her grandmother's 90th birthday.

name: Sausage Party
story_desc: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

name: Scoob!
story_desc: Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this dogpocalypse, the gang discovers that Scooby has an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.

name: Spirited Away
story_desc: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

name: Millennium Actress
story_desc: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

name: Shark Tale
story_desc: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

name: Shaun the Sheep Movie
story_desc: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
story_desc: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Neon Genesis Evangelion (1995).

name: Shrek
story_desc: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

name: Shrek 2
story_desc: Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.

name: Shrek Forever After
story_desc: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpelstiltskin rules supreme.

name: Shrek the Third
story_desc: Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.

name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
story_desc: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

name: Sing
story_desc: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

name: Sing 2
story_desc: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

name: Sleeping Beauty
story_desc: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

name: Smallfoot
story_desc: High up on a mountain peak surrounded by clouds, a secret Yeti society lives in peace and harmony. One day, a Yeti witnesses an airplane crash; Inside lies "Smallfoot", a legendary creature that will rock the society to its core.

name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
story_desc: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

name: Song of the Sea
story_desc: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.

name: Soul
story_desc: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

name: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
story_desc: When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

name: Space Jam
story_desc: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

name: Space Jam: A New Legacy
story_desc: A rogue artificial intelligence kidnaps the son of famed basketball player LeBron James, who then has to work with Bugs Bunny to win a basketball game.

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
story_desc: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

name: Spies in Disguise
story_desc: When the world's best spy is turned into a pigeon, he must rely on his nerdy tech officer to save the world.

name: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
story_desc: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training, yet, throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
story_desc: After the Republic's victory on Christophsis, Anakin and his new apprentice, Ahsoka Tano, must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt. Political intrigue complicates their mission.

name: Storks
story_desc: Storks have moved on from delivering babies to packages. But when an order for a baby appears, the best delivery stork must scramble to fix the error by delivering the baby.

name: Stuart Little 2
story_desc: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

name: Surf's Up
story_desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

name: TMNT
story_desc: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

name: Tangled
story_desc: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

name: Tarzan
story_desc: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

name: Weathering with You
story_desc: A high-school boy who has run away to Tokyo befriends a girl who appears to be able to manipulate the weather.

name: Castle in the Sky
story_desc: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

name: The Addams Family
story_desc: The eccentrically macabre family moves to a bland suburb where Wednesday Addams' friendship with the daughter of a hostile and conformist local reality show host exacerbates conflict between the families.

name: The Adventures of Tintin
story_desc: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

name: The Angry Birds Movie 2
story_desc: The flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their feud to the next level.

name: The Ant Bully
story_desc: After Lucas Nickle floods an ant colony with his water gun, he's magically shrunken down to insect size and sentenced to hard labor in the ruins.

name: The Aristocats
story_desc: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

name: The Bad Guys
story_desc: To avoid prison, a gang of notorious animal criminals pretend to seek being rehabilitated, only for their leader to secretly find that he genuinely wants to change his ways.

name: The Black Cauldron
story_desc: A young boy and a group of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

name: The Book of Life
story_desc: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.

name: The Boss Baby
story_desc: A suit-wearing, briefcase-carrying baby pairs up with his 7-year old brother to stop the dastardly plot of the CEO of Puppy Co.

name: The Boxtrolls
story_desc: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.

name: The Brave Little Toaster
story_desc: A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.

name: The Breadwinner
story_desc: In 2001, Afghanistan is under the control of the Taliban. When her father is captured, a determined young girl disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.

name: The Croods
story_desc: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

name: The Croods: A New Age
story_desc: The prehistoric family the Croods are challenged by a rival family the Bettermans, who claim to be better and more evolved.

name: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
story_desc: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

name: The Emoji Movie
story_desc: Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji.

name: The Emperor's New Groove
story_desc: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

name: The Fox and the Hound
story_desc: A little fox named Tod, and Copper, a hound puppy, vow to be best buddies forever. But as Copper grows into a hunting dog, their unlikely friendship faces the ultimate test.

name: The Good Dinosaur
story_desc: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

name: The Great Mouse Detective
story_desc: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

name: The Grinch
story_desc: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
story_desc: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

name: The Incredibles
story_desc: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

name: The Iron Giant
story_desc: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

name: The Jungle Book
story_desc: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

name: The Land Before Time
story_desc: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

name: The Last Unicorn
story_desc: A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.

name: The Lego Batman Movie
story_desc: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

name: The Lego Movie
story_desc: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

name: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
story_desc: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

name: The Lego Ninjago Movie
story_desc: Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas.

name: The Lion King
story_desc: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

name: The Lion King
story_desc: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

name: The Little Mermaid
story_desc: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

name: The Lorax
story_desc: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

name: The Lord of the Rings
story_desc: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
story_desc: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.

name: The Mitchells vs the Machines
story_desc: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.

name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
story_desc: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

name: The Nut Job
story_desc: An incorrigibly self-serving exiled squirrel finds himself helping his former park brethren survive by raiding a nut store, a location that also happens to be a front for a human gang's bank robbery.

name: The Peanuts Movie
story_desc: Snoopy embarks upon his greatest mission as he and his team take to the skies to pursue their archnemesis, while his best pal Charlie Brown begins his own epic quest back home to win the love of his life.

name: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
story_desc: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.

name: The Polar Express
story_desc: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

name: The Prince of Egypt
story_desc: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

name: The Princess and the Frog
story_desc: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

name: The Rescuers
story_desc: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

name: The Rescuers Down Under
story_desc: R.A.S. agents Miss Bianca and Bernard race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

name: The Road to El Dorado
story_desc: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

name: The Sea Beast
story_desc: When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters - and make history to boot.

name: The Secret Life of Pets
story_desc: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

name: The Secret Life of Pets 2
story_desc: Continuing the story of Max and his pet friends, following their secret lives after their owners leave them for work or school each day.

name: The Secret of Kells
story_desc: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.

name: The Secret of NIMH
story_desc: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she suspected.

name: The Simpsons Movie
story_desc: After Homer pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpsons are declared fugitives.

name: The Smurfs
story_desc: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into New York City.

name: The Smurfs 2
story_desc: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been abducted by Gargamel, since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation, creatures called "The Naughties", into real Smurfs.

name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
story_desc: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

name: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
story_desc: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.

name: The Swan Princess
story_desc: A power-hungry sorcerer curses a princess to live as a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.

name: The Sword in the Stone
story_desc: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

name: The Tale of Despereaux
story_desc: An unusually brave mouse helps to restore happiness to a forlorn kingdom after making friends with a gentleman rat.

name: The Transformers: The Movie
story_desc: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

name: The Wild
story_desc: An adolescent lion is accidentally shipped from the New York Zoo to Africa. Now running free, his zoo pals must put aside their differences to help bring him back.

name: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
story_desc: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.

name: Titan A.E.
story_desc: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

name: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
story_desc: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

name: Tom & Jerry
story_desc: A chaotic battle ensues between Jerry Mouse, who has taken refuge in the Royal Gate Hotel, and Tom Cat, who is hired to drive him away before the day of a big wedding arrives.

name: My Neighbor Totoro
story_desc: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

name: Toy Story
story_desc: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

name: Toy Story 2
story_desc: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

name: Toy Story 3
story_desc: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

name: Toy Story 4
story_desc: When a new toy called "Forky" joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

name: Treasure Planet
story_desc: In this science fiction rendering of the classic novel "Treasure Island", Jim Hawkins (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) is a rebellious teen seen by the world as an aimless slacker. After he receives a map from a dying pirate, he embarks on an odyssey across the universe to find the legendary Treasure Planet.

name: Trolls
story_desc: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

name: Turbo
story_desc: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

name: Turning Red
story_desc: A 13-year-old girl named Meilin turns into a giant red panda whenever she gets too excited.

name: Tokyo Godfathers
story_desc: On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.

name: Up
story_desc: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

name: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
story_desc: When a girl is abducted by a vampire, a legendary bounty hunter is hired to bring her back.

name: WALL·E
story_desc: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

name: Waking Life
story_desc: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

name: Watership Down
story_desc: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
story_desc: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

name: Winnie the Pooh
story_desc: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.

name: Wish Dragon
story_desc: Determined teen Din is longing to reconnect with his childhood best friend when he meets a wish-granting dragon who shows him the magic of possibilities.

name: Wolfwalkers
story_desc: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.

name: Wreck-It Ralph
story_desc: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

name: Yellow Submarine
story_desc: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

name: Zootopia
story_desc: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

name: Wolf Children
story_desc: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.
